name: Lights out (itch) (Phantomcorps)
description:
LIGHTS OUT
Lights out is a game where you use the power of light to purify strange creatures in a dungeon for some reason
w to jump
a to go left
d to go right
s to pick up items
q to change light
e to change weapons
z to pause
use your mouse to aim

left click uses your weapon and right click lights up your light

Planned for later:

- Working on doors and chests now, to be fixed later
- Light depletes battery
- Implementing battle system
- Fixing the bunnies
Will input a surprize eventually!
